subject: Appointment Booking Issue
message: Hi, I'm having trouble booking an appointment through your website. The system keeps showing an error when I try to select a time slot with Dr. Smith. Could you please help me resolve this issue?

subject: Insurance Coverage Question
message: Hello, I wanted to inquire about which insurance plans your clinic accepts. I have Blue Cross Blue Shield and want to confirm coverage before scheduling my first appointment.

subject: Prescription Refill Request
message: I need to refill my prescription for blood pressure medication. My usual doctor Dr. Williams is not available this week. Can someone else help me with this refill?
user_agent: Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 17_0 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15

reply.message: Hello Emily, we can help you with your prescription refill. Please call our pharmacy department at 555-0100 during business hours.

subject: General Inquiry
message: What are your clinic hours? I work late shifts and need to know if you have evening appointments available.

subject: Medical Records Request
message: I need copies of my medical records from my last visit on June 10th for my new specialist. How can I request these documents?
